11.content: Which story do you want to choose for Balto to gain weight?
11.title: Balto

111.content:
as balto was named the hero of the town and accepted into a loving family, he quickly got use to the lazy household dog lifestyle.
constant warm, abunadant food and loving pets. as he grew more accustom to this lifestyle he slowly began to gain more weight. one night after his normal dinner, he noticed the leftovers at the table and walked over before he looked up into the children's eyes. they giggled and said "momma, pappa, i think balto is still hungry" the adults looked down at the wolf hybrid and laughed "getting a growing appetite are we boy?" father asked, he barked in response causing the children to laugh. while their mother looked skeptical she then gave into his adorning puppy eyes and smiled "alright boy, but just for tonight"
balto barked again in victory as the massive load of leftovers greeted his chocolate eyes. without hesitation he began to chow down, savouring each rich and greasy flavour.

as he finally finished the load, he sat back and rubbed his bloated gut. he'd never been this full before and whined slightly as the pleasure and pain overwhelmed him.
his family looked at him and father leant down and started to rub his boy's full tummy, this helped relieve balto's discomfort as he licked the man's face before slowly walking to lay by the fire.
mother looked over at the bloated dog and said to her family "we need to how much we feed Balto, he's not use to such large amounts of food"
the children looked at her and whined "but look mommy, he's so happy. he was so thin..." she did in fact look at the dog to see a smile on his lips as he lay asleep.

she looked back and said "we can treat him... sometimes. ok"
they cheered and all went to bed.
111.title: Balto becomes lazy and packs on the pounds.

choices: Maybe join in him eating meat?
Or maybe feed Steele and watch the Husky get big.
113.content:
Balto was out in about in Nome just enjoying his day, after since he saved the children in the town he was always respected as a hero. But what happened to Steele he wondered, sure Steele may have been a bully to the Wolfdog but Balto had some concerns for him as he was not the mammal that wanted pay back to his tormentors as he believed on treat everyone as you want to be treated as he adopted that belief system from Boris.

It wasn't until Balto heard some someone chewing on something in the butcher's meat locker and Balto being the curious wolf dog went in to investigate. What he saw shocked him as it was Steele by himself chewing on the meat.

"Steele, what are you doing?" Balto asked as he found the husky dog that bullied him his entire life eating meat.

"Oh, if it isn't the wolfdog wonder who is going to report me for just wanting a snack in peace, how does it feel being a hero huh?" Steele said disgruntled to Balto.

"Um no, I am not going to tell anyone, I was just wondering what happened to you?" Balto said as he noticed that Steele looked a bit chubby in the underbelly while entering in.

"Well what does it look like to you!" Steele shouted out loud when the door closed shut as nobody noticed outside as it was just the two of them alone. "Eating this meat is the only comfort I can have after you took my place in the serum run, everydog in town hates me for lying and I guess I deserve it after all what I did to you, even my own team looks down upon me no wonder why." Steele anguishly said as tears started to come down from his eyes, as Balto now understood, true Steele did deserve what he did to him but he knew that wasn't going to solve anything as Balto thought of something in his head that could cheer up Steele.
113.title: Balto and Steele have an eating contest.

choices: My version of how this goes down
Your version of how this goes down
1131.content:
"So please just let me eat in peace." Steele said as he was going back to eating until Balto interjected.

"How about this Steele, up for an eating contest?" Balto said as it got Steele's attention. "A what? You mean you want to eat this meat with me?" "Yeah, I guess you can say that. Maybe until our bellies our big and full?" And with that Steele started to wag his tail. "Okay it's a deal than." said Steele.
1131.title: How about an eating contest?

11311.content:
"So, what should be the rules than?" Steele said curiously. "I don't, maybe if we just get into a pile of meat and eat every single meat till it's gone and last one is the winner?" "I wonder, do wolves have a big appetite?" Steele said "Oh you'll see." Balto said as they position themselves at the huge stack pile of meat.

"Alright... GO!" Balto shouted as they both dug in the pile of meat devouring every single piece of meat there was, lucky for Steele as he had the upper hand as his belly was just starting to get big and for Balto his belly was starting to become a bit chubby.

"Heh, look at you only look like you just ate a full day's meal and your not big enough compared to me!" Steele taunted

The challenge was on and Balto wasn't going to let Steele win so easy but he felt his belly was so full so he mustard his inner wolf in him to wolfdown the meat instead of chewing it.

10 minutes later their bellies started to touch the ground, and Balto has overcame his discomfort in his in his belly as it now started to feel so good.

"You know Balto, this is pretty fun idea to see who can have the biggest belly." Said Steele as Balto repliedback "Yeah I know, so I guess we're friends now?" "Maybe if we reach to a tie?" So they continued on with each juicy meat they consume and digested into fat.

About an hour in their bellies were bigger than a dog standing on two feet, their once muscular legs were now replaced with flab along with their big behinds and chests formed two big pillow like moobs.

Balto was in a sitting position with his paws pressuring into his fat belly as it felt good to be this big as he held in his maw the last piece of steak.

"Hey Wolfy! Give me that slice of meat, I'm still hungry." Steele said as he waddled behind Balto but couldn't move with the big lard of a white belly limited him from getting closer to the equally lard wolfdog.

"What's wrong big guy, are you already beached, you glutton?" Balto said with a smile as he chuckled with the meat still in his maw. Steele jumped up with his hind legs but with his belly still on the ground as Steele than rolled down in the front direction where Steele's head landed behind Balto's butt with a thump.

Balto than sucked up the last meat in defiance. "Looks like I win Steele." Balto said as he turned his head towards Steele.

The Husky left up from the Wolfdog's behind.

"Really? It look like a tie to me as we are both equally fatasses." Steele exclaimed proving a point. "Okay Steele, it's a tie." He said as Balto moved a bit to where Steele was sitting. Both of their fat bellies making sloshing and gurgling noises.

"You look pretty good with a fat look on ya wolfdog." "I could say the same for you too Steele." They both complemented their bellies as both of them started getting an attractive to eachother. Balto and Steele enjoyed looking at eachother's bellies with their noises going on until they heard some paw steps coming to the entrance and it was...

Author's note here's what Balto and Steele look like with idea of them both fat. http://www.furaffinity.net/view/31432577... So far this is where let you decide what happens to Balto and Steele, will they form so fatty love relationship, what will Jenna think of this? What will Steele's old gang do? The choice is up to you.
11311.title: My version of how this goes down

choices: Drink water from a huge water storage tank for Jenna.
113111.content:
Jenna enter in the butcher's meat locker to see Balto and Steele with their bellies taking up most of the space as gurgling noises came from them.

"Jenna? W-what are you doing here?" Balto said surprised as he might've been embarrassed at the state his mate will notice.

"I could say the same for you, how did you two got so huge?" Jenna stated seeing the huge fat bellies the husky and wolfdog had taken as she moved closer to the lard wolfdog.

"Uh, well..." Balto said as he turn his direction to Steele as he too must've been embarrassed as him and than looked down at Jenna. "I thought I could just cheer Steele up a bit with an eating contest and...oh!" Balto said as he felt his belly moaned and gurgling loudly with a sharp pain inside his stomach feeling like something was about to burst but than moved up his softecas which let out a big.....

*Burrrup!* which shook the entire building like an Earthquake and it too shook Steele 's belly as well and like a chain reaction, the sharp pain in stomach, movement in throat, than the loud belch.

Jenna laughed at the the belching lead off by Balto and Steele even though it scared her bit since she thought something serious had gone wrong with her mate.

"You two actually have a handsome look with that belly on you guys." Jenna said as she jumped her two front paws up to Balto's belly which made the lard wolfdog blush at the complement from his mate as it sounded like Jenna didn't mind having a chubby hubby and Balto loved the pressure from Jenna's paws on his belly. Jenna looked at her mate's belly and noticed something about it.

"Wow, Balto you have a deep belly button." Jenna said as she puted her snout in Balto's navel which left Balto an odd sensation wanting something shaved in his navel now while Steele felt jealous of Balto still having a mate who still loves you even if you were chucky. "You know what, I want to have a belly like you guys now." Jenna said as she got down from her mate's belly. To which Balto replied.

"But we don't have anymore meat here, we don't know where there would be any large chunk to eat off of." Balto said as it was a known fact that he and Steele have already eaten the meat in the locker already. "Actually I think I have an idea that could satisfy Jenna." Steele proposed.

"Really? What is it?" Jenna said with excitement.

115.title: Free Choice

choices: Sit down next to Balto and start to fill herself up with water like him.
Tell Balto that he should get bigger.
1152.content:
Balto and Jenna had been talking about this for over a week now. Jenna didnt really believe that a dog could drink more than 5 liters of water or some other liquid but Balto thould that it was possible.
"Come on Jen, it IS possible to drink a lot water." Balto said as the two walked throught the streets of Nome. "Even for you."
"I still dont think that i or you could hold so much." Jenna answered. "I mean, how should so much water fit into a body like mine?"
"In you belly of course." Balto smiled. "The more you drink, the bigger your belly will get."
"And after 5 liters it will pop." Jenna grinned. "Like a balloon."
"Jen, we tried to find a solution for this theme for over a week now." Balto said. "So if you still dont think that it is possible to drink more than 5 liters, then i will show you that i can do it."
Jenna stopped.
"You what?" She asked. "You will what?"
"I will show you how much water i can drink." Balto explained. "So you will have a visible, and touchable prove that it is possible."
Jenna smiled.
"Okay, if you want to show me, then lets do this." She said. "Lets go to Rosies house and then you can try to surprise me."
After a short walk the two dogs reaced Rosies house and walked into the backyard.
Balto went to the wall of the shack, sat down and leaned his back against the wall.
"Could you be so kind and give me the hose Jenna dear?" He smiled.
Jenna grabbed the gardenhose with her mouth and reached it to Balto.
"Do you really want to do this?" She asked him.
"Of course i will." He answered. "Unless you belive me."
"I still dont think..." Jenna began.
"Okay, if you insist..." Balto said putting the nozzle into his mouth.
He pushed the valve on the nozzle and started to drink forcing large gulps of water down his throat.
Jenna looked at the valve of the gardenhose next to her where the water meter started to count.
After a few seconds it already showed 2 liters.
Jenna looked to Balto who was still drinking with a big smile on is face, then she looked down at his belly.
And Baltos belly started to swell!
Jenna couldnt believe it!
"Could it be?" She thought. "Can he really drink so much water?"
Balto continued to drink and the water meter counted higher and higher.
It reaced 3 liters, then 4 and finally 5 while Baltos belly got round like a basketball.
Jenna looked at the water meter and her eyes widened as it reaced 6 liters.
"Okay Balto, i believe you." She said. "You can really drink more than 5 liters." She looked at his belly. "And you got a cute little belly." She grinned.
Balto grinned and continued to drink.
"Don't you want to stop now?" Jenna asked.
Balto shook his head.
"You want to drink more?" She asked surprised.
Balto nodded.
"And how much?" Jenna asked.
Balto shrugged and continued to drink his belly getting bigger and bigger.
Jenna sat down next to Balto and put a paw on his growing belly.
"You get pretty round dont you?" She asked smiling.
Balto grinned and put his paw on hers.
Now Jenna got the idea.
"You only did this beause you wanted to pump your belly full of water in front of me right?" She asked.
Balto nodded and pushed his paw on hers so that both paws pushed deep into his belly.
"Should i turn the water up so that your belly can get bigger?" She asked him.
He nodded quickly.
Jenna grinned.
"Okay, then i will pump you up." She said and turned the valve of the hose on full blast. "Like a balloon."
Balto moaned and his belly started to grow rapidly getting bigger with every second.
He put both paws on his belly and enjoyed his swelling body.
Jenna looked at Baltos swelling belly wondering if she could get as big as him if she whould do this.
As Baltos belly reaced the size of a huge beachball he pushed the valve on the nozzle again and took the hose out of his mouth.
"You see Jen." He said and belched. "I CAN drink a lot of water."
Jenna smiled.
"Oh yes, you can." She said. "Nearly 100 liters."
"Really?" Balto asked and laughed. "Thats more as i ever had since i started this."
Jenna looked at him.
"You do this more often?" She asked surprised.
"Sure." Balto answered.
Then he grinned.
"Wanna try it?" He asked suddenly holding the nozzle up.
Jenna was surprised and looked at the nozzle, then at Baltos huge water bloated belly, then she imagined her own belly at this size.

What should she do now?

Jenna decides to find and have a partner to team up with to have fun, Jenna finds the beautiful female pale purple goose Stella, Jenna figures Stella would want to be and get more beautiful for Boris.

1251.content:
Jenna and Stella had now talked for weeks about that dream they shared.

They always wanted to inflate their bellies to incredible big sizes.

But they couldnt find a way to do it right so that they both get inflated fast and big.
Luckily for them a company that produced huge airships moved into the city to test their airships in the cold weather of alaska.
And for those airships they need a lot of air and helium to fill them up. So Jenna and Stella finally found a way to inflate.

A few weeks after the company arrived Jenna and Stella had a plan how they can inflate their bellies.
Jenna sat on a hill looking over the area where the airship company had her huge warehouses waiting for Stella who made a little observation flight to check out the area.
Finally Stella landed next to Jenna.
"Hey Stella." Jenna greeted the goose. "Is everything like we planned?"
"Better." Stella answered. "They have so many tanks with air that we could inflate for days, no weeks."
"Perfect." Jenna smiled. "Is there something we need to care about? Someting like guards or something?"
"I saw some guarddogs on the main gate, but those are no problem for our plan." Stella answered. "So should we start?"
"Yes, lets go." Jenna grinned.
They started to walk towards the fence around the area.
Stella had no problems to get over the fence, but Jenna had more trouble.
But then Jenna spottet a small three who had fallen on the fence and that she could use as a ramp to get on the other side.

After they had crossed the fence they had no more problems and entered a gigantic hangar who was big enought to contain 4 Airships with 260 meters lengt at the same time.
"Whoa, this place is huge!" Jenna gasped.
"Not as huge as we will be soon." Stella grinned.
"Haha, yes youre right." Jenna agreed. "So lets get big!"

The two walked over to some Hoses laying on the floor.
"So, which hose should we use?" Stella asked.
"Hmm, lets see..." Jenna said. "We have air, helium and i see a huge air compressor over there."

Should they...
1251.title: Inflation with airship blimp inflation tanks

choices: Stella fattens to the size of a large city
Stella fattens to the size of the earth
1252.content:
"Over here Stella" said Jenna "This is the place I told you about. Inside there should be two giant vats that can somehow create a never ending stream of whale fat from nothing." Stella was ecstatic that she was about to get what she always dreamed of, to feed and fatten endlessly. Stella went in and sat in a wide open area of the factory as Jenna grabbed the two hoses and brought them to Stella. She stuck both hoses into Stella's mouth. Sensors in the hose sensed that it was time to activate the vats which began to send a constant stream of whale fat into her mouth. As she started gluttonously gulping down the fat, a huge smile came upon her face. Her whole body began pulsing out at a constant rate. Even after just a few seconds her cheeks were already the size of large beach balls. She already had a few dozen chins pour out in front of her. Her belly fattened and sprawled out in front of her, already the size of a small boulder. Her breasts had also fattened quite a bit and layed on the ground on both sides of her. Both rump cheeks were the size of a large boulder. Stella moaned in pleasure, delighting at the site of her massive belly growing bigger, fatter, while rolls appeared all over her. She was like a balloon being filled with fat. Stella was grabbing and playing with every roll she could reach while she still could. "Mmmmm, so big, so fat, so sexy. Crank up the flow to max Jenna, and blimp me to the extreme. Ooohhh, fill every single bit of me with tons upon tons of soft warm sexy flubber. Make me burst out of this factory. Make me EXPLODE with fat rolls, Make me an ocean of blubbery beautiful fat. DO IT, DO IT TO ME NOW, JUST KEEP MAKING ME FATTER AND FATTER AND FATTER. Feed me, FEED ME, FEEEEEEEEEEEED MEEE. Please make me an unrecognizable billowing blob of fat, blubber, and flab." Fortuitously for both of them, the hose and vat can also sense her lustful desire to be even fatter, and tripled the flow by itself. Jenna climbed up on her to get a view of her fattening face. Though when she gets there all she could see is a beak slightly poking out of countless jiggling rolls of fat that was wrapped around the hose. "Mmmm someone is a greedy glutenous piggy, aren't they. One that can't stop themselves from fattening uncontrollably." teased Jenna. "OH YES, OH YES, I'm a big fat piggy goose blob, so please make this fat blob even bigger, even blobbier, even FATTER. And please also play with all my bulging, thickening, rolls of fat." cried Stella. Jenna was more than happy to comply, as she began jumping up and down on her fat blob body. Making her a giant undulating ocean of fat, as waves of fat rolls crash into each other over and over again all over her body. Stella couldn't describe it, the feeling of every inch of her body swelling with more and more fat. But it felt amazing, she began to relax and sink into her own rolls of fat as she watched and felt herself fatten more and more.

It wasn't long until she filled the factory. Every nook and cranny filled with her fat. Her rolls started bursting through all the doors and windows. It wouldn't be long before her waves of fat smashed down the walls. Stella was squealing with joy as she felt the walls start to give. "Come on, COME ON, just a little more until I can fatten unconstrained. Then the whole WORLD can see this massive goose blob grow bigger and bigger." Suddenly she exploded out of the warehouse, her blob body billowing out and hitting the ground, making her jiggle, quake and shake like no one has ever seen before.
1252.title: Weight gain with two giant unused vats of whale...

choices: The formula starts making her lust and desire to fatten even more intense
Stella gains the mass of the Earth in fat every second
12521.content:
Stella was loudly moaning in pleasure as she continued fattening out in all directions. At this point, her neck rolls numbered in the thousands, with more blubber rolls forming every second. The neck rolls have completely swallowed up her head by several feet. Her hands and feet had also sunken deeps into her fat rolls by several feet. Her blob body had just started slamming into the surrounding buildings. The feeling made Stella scream, "Oh god, I'm helpless to stop myself from getting fatter, it just feels too good. I'm a prisoner in my own blob body, unable to move or wiggle any part of me, and I LOVE it. Oh, but I need to be even more massive. I need to be even FATTER, and I need the whole world to see." Jenna said "This really is all you want to do isn't it. To have your rolls of fat pool out in every direction and smother anything in the way of your blob body." Stella's blob rolls have already covered half the city, truly showcasing her deep desire to grow and fatten out of control. "Of course this is all i want to do, and why should I do anything i don't want to. And all I want is to get FATTER. To have more and more fat pour out of me in a never ending tidal wave of flabby blob rolls." Stella answered. From afar Stella looked somewhat like a giant volcano that was erupting with lava. Except instead out lava flowing down her body and pooling on the ground all around her, it was her own thickening blubber rolls. Stella noticed a helicopter flying overhead, observing her. She knew it was filming her for the world to see, which turned her on even more. She starts moaning again, making sure the people in the helicopter could hear her, "Oooooh that it, make me FATTER, make my rolls cover the Earth. Feed me into a planet sized blob, just make me grow fatter beyond all comprehension. Please make me grow faster and faster. If only there was a super weight gain formula that I could also guzzle and gulp down."

Stella got just what she wanted as several new helicopters appeared, all carrying a giant vat with the words Mega-Gain on it. When they were over Stella they releases it, dropping it into several of her chin rolls. The force of the drop makes her blob body and fat rolls jiggle and slap together even more. Jenna made herself useful and grab the new hose, putting it into her eagerly awaiting maw. The formula quickly made its way into her mouth and down into her stomach. She surged out in an even faster constant rate. This made her totally and completely give herself to the fat. She couldn't focus on anything but the feeling of getting fatter and fatter. She just kept expanding, her goose blob body was like an ocean during an extreme hurricane. Wave after wave of fat crashed against each other harder than ever, making slapping noises that can be heard all around the world.
12521.title: Stella fattens to the size of a large city

choices: Jenna and Jared help feed Stella fatter
A giant universal sized vat of whale fat awaits for Stella
12522.content:
The factory building's whaling company manager arrives, just in time to see the pale purple goose blobs' flab and blubbery rolls and body explode and erupt out from the factory building. Which was the size of a football field. Jared, a young human male of 18 years of age, and surprisingly enough the manager of the local whaling company, walked on closer to the wobbling and jiggling mass of goose fat.

Jared could tell that the pale purple goose was feeding from the two giant vats of unlimited supply of whale fat, judging by the two hoses going up to the top most middle area and down into the towering pile of rolls that must likely to have been the neck of the goose. So without wasting any time, Jared, climbs up the rolls of flabby fat until he gets up to where Jenna is. Fortunately, he was born with the rare ability to understand animal language. He noted the red husky playing with the blob goose's fat in various ways. He settled himself down at the entrance to the vertical tunnel of ringing and jiggling neck rolls with the two hoses going down there. "Well, my my my, your such a hungry and gluttonous and beautiful goose. Hello, my name's Jared. I kinda owned the factory building you broke out of. Don't worry, I have more along Alaska's shores. With more giant vats of whale fat."

Despite himself, he couldn't help but sit down, slightly sinking into Stella's flabby and easily jiggled blubbery fat. He started to rub and caress over her fat, not minding what Jenna would think about him. He always wanted a hungry and gluttonous female to be with and feed her fatter and endlessly fatter.

With Stella's gluttonous hungry feeding on the limitless supply of whale fat, she billowed, pulsated, jiggled, wobbled fatter and fatter, spreading out in a widening radius as well as bulging upwards, rolls stacking and piling up as she mounded higher, pooling and oozing outwards as she spread out further and farther. Within an hour, Stella was still on earth but she had fattened huge, no, massively enormous that Stella herself was the fat blob size of the planet earth.

125332.content:
"Let's take Stella to the new whaling company to feed her." Said Jenna.

"Okay, I'll go get her and meet you there." Boris said, turning to fly-hop and run towards the bay area where Balto's home boat rested. Once there, Boris told Stella about the whaling company and with a shock to Boris, she instantly got interested.

"A whaling company, you say? So what are we waiting for? Let's go. I'm VERY hungry. And instead of fish, I'd like to have some whale fat. Something I did before coming up to Nome down in the States. I had fed on so much whale fat that I had got so beautiful and gorgeously fat that I was at a whole ten tons of flab, blubber and rolls of goose fat." Stella explained, while rubbing and caressing over her goose body in various places, making moaning sounds. "Now I hope to get even far fatter. Much more bigger and fatter beautiful and gorgeous goose blob of fat than I did before. Maybe big and fat enough to be as to cover up all of Alaska, or even all of North America under my goose fat."

Without another word, they went off together to where the whaling company was to meet up with Jenna.

Upon arrival, they managed to get in without alarming the area since they had waited for the human workers to leave. By some luck, there was a hanger door left open since it was into the spring season. But they didn't know that the human manager was still there and was secretly watching them from behind a darkened room.

Inside the main hanger room, there was thousands of giant vats as big as two story houses lining up against both walls with all of their hoses from each side connected to one single hose, making two usable hoses laying out on the floor. This whaling company was, actually as big as ten football fields.

[What will Jenna, Boris and Stella do?]

[Go ahead and use both large hoses to feed Stella the whale fat?]

[The lone human manager shows himself, interrupts and proceeds to help feed and fatten Stella the whale fat with both hoses at the same time, while he not only watches Stella glutton herself on the whale fat but also climb up on her to caress her goose fat.]
125332.title: Take Stella to the whaling company to feed her

13.content:
Aleu woke up one morning to find out she had a big problem...a very big one.

The day before, she had been brought back home to Nome to once more live with her family, and, amazingly enough, now former wolf enemy Niju was living with them, as well.

You see, Niju had, yesterday morning, been feeling agonized at his decisions, thanks to what his awful past had made him into and, after running through the woods for some time, gone into a cavern which just happened to have a special geode in it, as he would discover once he was deep in there, said geode being between quite a few stalactites and stalagmites.

It's status of being special, as the glowing mysticism would give off, was that it could literally do anything and everything that anyone and everyone who happened across it wanted, and what little good was left in Niju spurred him to put this to the best use it could be put to.

So, looking directly at it, he had its mystic properties make it so that everything was forever set right with the world, past, present and future, and that everyone would know he did it and why he decided to.

Though it worked, there were two side effects...Niju was teleported to Nome and so was Aleu(though Nava was perfectly able to become the pack's leader once more), and, thanks to how Niju had done this on a day when nighttime would just happen to have a full moon, there was an even worse side effect that no one would know about until it happened.

And that was how anyone who slept under where the full moon's beams were on that night would have a full moon kind of weight gain of the vastest sort.

Despite him and everyone else knowing all else about what Niju had done, neither he nor any one of them, Aleu or otherwise, was aware of the second side effect and neither he nor them counted on it, either.

They easily came to see, despite not knowing it before, what the first side effect had to be, and everyone, including Aleu and Niju, easily adjusted to having her old life back and having his new life now started, respectively.

Niju told everyone how sorry he was for all he'd done, but Balto pointed out it wasn't necessary and that everyone knew he'd done this largely out of repentance, along with all else everyone knew about what he'd done(of course Niju was welcomed to his new life as a friend and non-bloodline member of Balto's family, which he was most grateful for along with loving all the forgiveness and lauding he received).

So, moving on to the fact that each canine had a different sleeping spot on that night and Aleu was sleeping under that full moon, its beams made her glow white, and, when she woke up the next morning...

"WHAT THE?! HOW DID I GET THIS WAY?!! I JUST HAPPENED TO FALL ASLEEP UNDER THE MOON!!!!" Aleu exclaimed, confused, shocked and terrified.

You see, despite how her forepaws and forelegs, hindpaws, central back and lower hind legs, neck, tail and face looked more or less the same as before, it was a whole different story with the rest of her, as she had layers and ripples of fat aplenty on her sides of her back and belly alike, and speaking of her belly, it was easily larger than the world's biggest exercise ball, almost obscuring her face.

There was no denying it. Aleu was morbidly obese, and blatantly so. Even her navel, despite being the same otherwise, had gotten longer, deeper and taller.

She didn't know what she was going to do or what she was going to tell anyone, and it went from bad to worse when she heard footsteps, and then a giant gasp of alarm, turning to see that it came from the throat of...

1351.content:
The one who had gasped upon seeing Aleu in her new state was none other than her brother, Kodi, who then exclaimed: "HOLY COW! WHOA! WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU, SIS? YOU WERE JUST THE SAME LAST NIGHT, AND ALL YOU DID WAS FALL ASLEEP LIKE THE REST OF US!"

Aleu then replied: "DO YOU THINK I'M NOT ASKING MYSELF THAT SAME QUESTION? Wait, Kodi...maybe this is just some kind of messed-up dream. How about we see if it is? You know, poking? Pinching? Other things like that?"

Kodi, calming down like she just had, said: "Yeah...that might be a good idea. This could be some sort of messed-up dream...let's see."

So he walked over and pinched Aleu's belly hard, pulling the giant pawful of blubber he got back just as hard and letting it snap back against her massive belly, causing Aleu to go: "OOOOOWWWW!!!! AAAAAAAAAA!!!! OOOOOOOO!!!! KODI, THAT HURTS!"

"Oh, sorry!" Kodi said. "Nuts! Maybe if I poke you in your belly button and run my claw up that and another part of that region of your belly, instead..."

Aleu nodded and Kodi poked her belly button, causing Aleu to go: "EEEHHHEEEHEE." because, while it didn't hurt, it did feel weird and sort of tickled, and when Kodi rubbed his foreclaw up the region of that part of her belly below her navel and through it and finally above it, it felt even odder and tickled even more, so Aleu said: "AHHEEHEEHEETEEHEEHEE..."

"Drat." Aleu said, but Kodi then said: "Sorry...but wait...I'm also sorry about how this is going to feel, but it's the last possibility of this just being a dream that we've got. Fair warning...it's really going to hurt, but it's either that or giving up on trying to see if you're just dreaming along with me."

"Gotcha." Aleu said, and so it was that Kodi bit her belly as hard as he could and grabbed two fistfuls of fat to go with the mouthful of blubber he now had and he pulled it all this way and that, then, knowing how painful this was for Aleu, he swiftly switched to pushing her belly around and in and out, also this way and that, in addition to licking it and then jumping on and hugging it, making it so that he was no longer hurting her, but was now tickling, hugging and rubbing her, which of course felt much nicer.

The sounds Aleu made were: "AAAAAAAAAIIIIIIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEAHAHAHAHAHAHAHATEEHEEHEEHEEHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAHHH HHHHHHHHHHHMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM..."

After she was no longer lost in the bliss from the soothing relief of what ways of Kodi's touching her belly were hugging and rubbing, she felt his nose touch her belly, his tail sweep across it, his forepaws beat on it as though it were a drum and all four of his feet climbing on up it with some gripping in order to get to the top of it, and when Aleu saw Kodi's face looking at her own following how she briefly laughed from how much it tickled, she then heard him sigh and shake his head along with seeing a disheartened look on his face, which she then echoed on all counts.

"Well, so much for the idea of it just being a messed-up dream." Kodi said to her.

"Yup." Aleu replied. "No question or doubt about it now...this is definitely reality. But seriously, how did I get so fat? I was just the way I had been before prior to falling asleep last night. And I wake up being this much a big, fat load of blubber? Huh?"

Suddenly, though, footsteps were heard by them both, and it would turn out that Balto, Jenna and Niju had recently found out about the effects of the full moon thing and what would happen if someone had slept under it the night that preceded this morning, right after they reacted accordingly to what had happened to Aleu and saw Kodi atop her huge sphere of a belly.

Now, the way that they explained everything after their shocked reaction was...

Aleu was out in the wilderness of the far east of Russia, hunting for some prey as it was her duty as pack leader of her wolves, it may not have been easy at first when joining them but luckily she received help from one of the wolves that had taken a liking to her as he was known as Taku a brown wolf that taught her the tricks of how wolves hunt froming a bond with each other becoming mates, even though Aleu was only part wolf, she still misses her family and friends in Nome especially her father most of all but at least she has found her place in the world.

As the wolf-dog was exploring the wilderness as she had ordered Taku take charge of the wolf pack due to how they had came the land known as Russia´s far east, Aleu volunteers herself of scouting out the whereabouts of this strange land along with having some alone time for herself even though it might have been a risked with only traveling by herself. It was only two days ago one of the wolves had spotted some flying object up in the sky that looked like some large bird and produced loud noises as it flown pass them and had disappeared over the mountains, that was Aleu´s mission to investigate where this strange bird was flying and after only a two days of heading towards the direction she had found the site of where it went.

This strange giant bird was of not of nature but rather made of metal as it laid down on its right side of the wing where the left one was sticking up and the plane had some strange markings or in this case human words that was completely foreign to her along with a red star on its left side, there was some strange scent that came from the giant metallic bird as Aleu approached to the side door of the metallic bird and what she saw was....

13521.content:
Aleu was so surprised of seeing so much meat in one place, she was famished from all the traveling she decided to eat the meat in the plane.

"Wow, what kind of meat is this?" Said Aleu as she saw what looked like a huge bag full of beef jerky as she sniffed the bag as it gave her a scent of a sweet roasted beef, her muzzle dipped in the open bag and came out with a piece of jerky in her maw and chewed it down her gullet, the taste of it was like nothing she had tasted any other meat her and her wolf pack had tasted when eating meat of their prey from hunting.

The flavor of that beef jerky had left her transfixed on eating the beef jerky she wanted more of it, more she wanted as she ripped the bag of beef jerky open and began taken huge chunks of the beef jerky biting it down and wolfing it down into her stomach, she repeated this 5 times and her stomach was starting to bulge out a bit.

When she was half way through the bag, Aleu noticed her belly felt full and saw her underbelly as it looked like she was 3 months pregnant as it was almost the size of soccerball"Am I gaing weight?" Aleu said to herself as she settled her hind on the floor of the plane and put her right front paw putting pressure on it as it felt tight and Aleu started to have a tummy ache.

"Oh, I don't feel so good. *Burps* maybe I should take a break, didn't realize that I might lose my thinly frame if I continue eating." Aleu said as she thinks to herself if she should stop now and get her wolf pack here, or should she continue eating the meat aboard this plane?
13521.title: MEAT! Er I mean she decides to take little bite...

135212.content:
Aleu thought to herself that if she continues to eat too much, she'll get fat, what will the other wolves think of her and most of all her father and brother Kodi. Will the wolves think of her as weak leader for eating all of the meat and would her father and brother be ashamed of her for getting fat?

But than she remembers a dream she had a few nights ago, in her dream as the wolf pack was traveling through this new land, the wolves were having a hard time trying to hunt down prey as many of the caribou were suddenly disappearing and as the wolf pack couldn't eat the caribou, they started to get weak and starved to death as if there was no prey to eat in this new land and most of all winter was coming.

She and her mate Taku were laying down in the floor of the cave. "Aleu, what happened to the caribou?" Her mate said as he was weak. "Taku hang in there, I'll find us something." Aleu tried to get up but her legs were malnourished and weak as she couldn't get up. "We haven't eaten anything in months Aleu, we couldn't even support our pups. Is this the end for us?" Taku replied as he was slowly drifting away. "Taku no! You can't give up yet, I can still-" Aleu was cut off as she realized he was gone as what was left were a wolf's skull and bones. "NOOO!" Aleu woke up right next to her mate as it was only a bad dream which woke him up as well.

Aleu now remembers what that dream meant, they haven't been able to find any caribou in a while and this meat would be their last chance of survival to get through the winter even if every wolf should be fat, this plane is filled with meat that can feed her entire wolf pack throughout this and she would prove it if she had to put on some weight.

Aleu went outside of the crashed plane and let out a howl as a way of communicating to her wolf pack from a far distance, 5 seconds later she heard their howl to her confirming they would come to her, the she wolfdog went back into the wreckage where a ton of meat was still there.

Aleu continues eating the rest of the beef jerky from the bag and than moves on to smoked sausages while still having a tummy ache but Aleu mustered on as she continued eating doing her best to ignore the discomfort. As she continued eating the meat the more weight she gained as her once thin legs started to look a bit flabby and her rump getting big as well and her soccer ball sized stomach was now the size of a beach ball as Aleu leaned back to examine her belly and she still believed she has enough room for her belly as it no longer felt discomfort and it was apparently true that wolves can expand their bellies and Aleu started to like her new fat look.

As Aleu was about to continue eating but than heard pawsteps coming as it turned out to be her wolf pack. "Aleu, we are here now, what have you found for us?" Taku announced outside along with the other wolves.

Aleu thought to herself if she would be embarrassed by rest of wolves as they would possibly think of her being selfish if she has eaten all of the meat but she should explain her plan that could help or even benefit her wolf pack. So she courageously came out of the door of the plane but with a bit of struggle as her belly was so big for the door itself "Hing! Come on!" She said as she pushed herself out but with enough luck she did.

As Aleu came outside of the wreckage plane within the wolf pack's sight, they were puzzled by Aleu as their female Alpha was fat. Nuk, the big wolf of the pack chuckled a bit at Aleu's new look which caught her attention. "What is it Nuk?"Aleu said to the big wolf, to which he repliemd back. "Sorry, sorry Aleu, I thought it looked like you were pregnant with a huge litter of puppies." Nuk said with his accent as he tried to control his laughter. "Well, than maybe you could feel them if I have to sit on you Nuk while I explain to everyone what we are going to do." Aleu said to the big wolf as he said "I apologize ma'am." As he was no longer chuckling.

"Alright," Aleu announced to the rest of the wolf pack, "What I have found here is some human craft that has crashed down here is indeed filled with meat, and we all know we haven't been able to find the caribou in the few days we have explored this territory and another fact that we are in the season of winter, every wolf here should store up fat to stay warm for the winter as you can see me here." All the wolves than talked to one another about this plan Aleu has for them and worried if they lose their physical fitness they need to hunt but some were starting to see her plan could definitely work for them in the end if they need to store up fat.

"I know it's weird but I remember the vision I had 2 weeks ago where we were starving to death and that we would even result in eating our own, this is our best chance of survival, consider this a blessing from the spirit brothers and sisters." The entire wolf pack concluded in a agreement to Aleu's statement and as ordered three wolves went inside to the wreckage plane and take out the rest of the meat Aleu had not eaten yet.

"Aleu, can we have a chat in private?" Taku said as Aleu came toward him with her fat belly jiggled.
135212.title: Take it easy, think this through if you want to...

Aleu decides to force feed her mate so that they are equally fat.
1352121.content:
Aleu waddled to her mate as every wolf was focused on having their share of the meat. Taku gaze at the big belly Aleu had on her as it jiggled. "Taku, is there something wrong?" Aleu said to him as he looked directly into her blue eyes. "Oh, well it's something.... I.... umm, I am going to say this and I never have told any wolf about this as it's a secret but..." Gesture his paw up to Aleu wanting to directly whisper in her ear. "I have had this fascination with bellies ever since I was a pup." "What?" Aleu replied as she was curious of Taku's meaning. "When ever I saw a female wolf baring Cubs or any other animal, I always wondered how big a belly can get, and you made me more attracted to you with your new weight." Taku confessed.

"I mean, I still love you no matter what as I have come to know you, and as your mate." Taku said as he was in approval for Aleu gaining weight. Aleu smiled at Taku and licked his muzzle. "So do you want to be fat like me hun?" Aleu said as Taku nodded.

"Good than, as Alphas of this wolf pack, we will be the ones who have the biggest bellies." Aleu said she take Taku to one of the piles of meat as every wolf was eating them like it was a fest.
1352121.title: Talk to Taku

choices: "Mm-No I just can't!" "Alright, it's going to be that way than?"(Force him)
14.content:
Kodi was out in about in the small town known as Nome where he considered it home since he was a little pup along with his family and sled team mates, he was just minding his own business just enjoying his day as it was a beautiful winter afternoon and wondering where Dusty was up too, just as he stumbled upon a shed, Kodi smelled something foreign in the air that came from the shed right next to him, being the curious wolf-husky that he got form his father he went in and what he saw shocked him.

What he saw was his team mate Dusty in the shed eating on the meat that was stored in there and Dusty looked different from usual, for instance her slim legs were now flabby as well as her thin frame was replaced with a tummy sticking out as she chewed on the meat before swallowing it down.

Kodi was surprised to see his friend and the dog he had a crush on was eating the thick meat juicy meat.
"Du-Dusty! What are you doing?" Kodi utter those words to his friend as he was worried.

"Oh Kodi! There you are!" Dusty turned her direction to him. "Come in! Try some of this meat out!" she said as she wobbled her way to him.

"But Dusty, isn't that meat from the butcher? We could get caught!" Kodi said looking at the weight Dusty had gained.

"Oh, come on Kodi, why would there be so much meat in here that could feed the town for years? Plus, if they have so much meat in here, would it go bad if it just stays in for the entire season?" Dusty raised a good point as there was lots of meat that had an expiration date March in the current year but still was hesitant in joining with her.

"But, we have to be in shape if we are in need to pull the sled and besides don't we have kibble the humans give us for our meals?" Kodi countered the reasoning Dusty presented to him.

"Yeah, but I heard kibble doesn't give the protein a working dog needs from what I heard." Dusty said to Kodi in which he replied back. "And who told you that?" "Dipsy." "What?! Dispy doesn't do much as she's just Mr. Conner's pet and we are sled dogs!" Kodi pointed out the fact that taking advice from a dog like Dipsy won't do much.

"Well, your part wolf from your dad's side and since dogs and wolves are related, it's much more natural for them to eat meat than what the humans provide?" Dusty also brought up that fact that made Kodi second thinking his stance but was a bit hesitant.

"Well, uh..." Kodi tried to muster up his thoughts till Dusty brought up another fact. "And I heard that storing up fat will also keep you warm form the whether we're having today right?" and just like that a blizzard was forming outside of the shed where Kodi started to shiver a bit as the breeze came in quick that the door in the outside closed on it self shut leaving only the two of them alone inside of the meat locker.

"So, what will it be than Kodiak?" Dusty said into his ear as his stomach also growled at him for missing out on his meal in the afternoon as well.
14.title: Kodi

1422.content:
"Mm-No I just can't!" Kodi said as he know that he won't be able to run faster in a condition of being fat. "Alright, it's going to be that way than?" Dusty said as she now takes action.

"What? You ca-" Kodi is cut out when Dusty whacks him in the head with a thick meat leg so hard that he stumbles to the ground. "Sorry Kodiak, but you leave me with no choice." She said to him as Kodi's vision blurs out into darkness losing consciousness.


It might have been an hour since he was knocked out but Kodi finds himself in a sitting position on the floor of the meat locker shed with his legs tied up (hind legs on the floor and his fore legs tied to planks of wood in like a make shift chair) only with his sled dog harness on him that's tied to a pillar wood stand where his back lay against making sure he can't escape along with his thin white under belly exposed.

Kodi was trying to remember what had happen as if it were a strange dream he had but to his dismay this was realty. "Ah finally your awake." Kodi turned to his left direction to see Dusty walking or should we say wobbling to him as Dusty now looked more fat as the sliver creamy under belly of hers jiggled a bit in comparison to when Kodi saw her she only looked like she was pregnant with pups (If only Kodi wished that were the case than it would be understandable for her to eat a lot).

"DUSTY! CUT THIS OUT NOW!" Kodi shouted at her to which she said. "Come on Kodi, think of this as date?" she said as her nose was against Kodi's close enough for a nose boop.

"A date? Since when does a date involved one of the two lovers forcing the other to EAT!?" "Don't be like that, I am generously feeding you, look your bones are visible on your chest." Dusty putted up a paw to him so that he can feel how his skin was so close to the rib cage of his chest.

"No! I am not that hungry!" He protested but his stomach still growled at him for denying his hunger.

"Looks like you stomach disagrees with you, here we can go with two options," Dusty said as Kodi listens to her suggestion. "I can just hand you food for you to consume as your belly gets bigger, but if you don't comply, I am going to have force you with this device here." Dusty walked over to reveal a machine with a hose attached to it.

"Uh...uh, Wh-what is that?!" Kodi muttered in fear of what he saw before him. "That," Dusty turned her head towards it. "its a food capacitor, what it does is it grinds the meat into bits of mush where it's easy to sallow down." she than looks back at the helpless wolf-husky, Kodi had no choice but to comply.

"Okay! Okay okay... Ju-just don't overdue it Dusty." Kodi muttered those words in defeat as Dusty's tail was wagging from her big behind. "Once you get this big like I am, you will feel so much pleasure." as she goes get a meat leg from a plie nearby, she comes to Kodi with only the leg of the bone as Kodi than chews on it and swallows it down and took another bite after that repeating that again and again.

After about 20 minutes of Kodi eating the scraps of meat where he just finished his sixth try, his stomach was starting to bulge out a bit with a naval belly button showing itself as Dusty saw it. "Hey look you got a cute belly button on your tummy!" Dusty pointed with her paw to show Kodi. "Dusty, I think I am about full here, I don't think I can take much more." Kodi groans as he felt like he ate 5 bowls of kibble. "So it's the food capacitor than?" When Dusty mentioned the food capacitor he immediately took back what he said and Dusty gladly went back to get another scrap of meat and Kodi took another bite out of it.

As Kodi was now on his 13th try of eating a spare rib, Kodi's belly was at a size of a beach ball as it was full of food, Kodi felt overwhelm as this was too much for a meal a dog could eat in a day. "Dusty, I th-thi-think I can't... eat much..more...please stop for a mome-" Kodi fell to a food coma sleep, Dusty still wanting Kodi to be fat like herself respected his wish as he need more time to digest the food in him which just leaves Dusty the perfect opportunity to strap the food capacitor to his maw and muzzle and after that went back on packing on pounds as well.

After an hour, Kodi woke up from his food coma slumber as he flet his body was different as his chest felt like flab moobs along with his legs now felt flabby than a dog's or a wolf's athletic muscle along with his rump felt bigger and heavy as well, all of the digesting has put him in this condition and his belly now flet big but still at the size of a beach ball and his sled dog harness was still on him and he notice his maw was strapped to a hose to the food capacitor!

"Hmm! Dufmh!" Kodi tried to speak but couldn't make the words proper instead. "Don't worry now Kodi, your belly has just digested all that food you ate so you have more room for more." Dusty said as she was right next to the food capacitor and Dusty was also different as well as now her silver belly is bigger as it touched the ground and was twines the size than Kodi's, Dusty than activates the food capacitor as meat was grinding into mush and moved it's way to the hose leading to Kodi's maw.

"HUMMPH-" Kodi tried to yell for help but was no use as there was nothing he can do as the mush meat went in his mouth and forced down his gullet with more and more came in. Dusty move a bit as she can with her belly just dragging on the floor, only her pudgy hind legs could move as her belly kept her fore legs up from the ground, wobbling her way to Kodi as he tried to get this strap off of him.

"Kodi, you can't fight it, just let it in it will be alright." Dusty told him in a soothing tone as Kodi had tears in his eyes when he looked at her as he again felt his belly swollen up again.

"Lets just see how big your belly can get till that harness on you bursts off." Kodi's belly began to moan and groan at how full of mush meat was in there it was 3 times the size of a beach ball of a white creamy belly and the sled dog harness getting tighter and tighter on Kodi's belly till.

*PING*

The metal pin of the sled dog harness bursts off of Kodi's belly like a bullet straight into the food capacitor that shut it down, Kodi took a sign of relief as there was no more mush meat going down in his gullet as Dusty took the strap off of him which fell on to Kodi's belly that was now at the same size of Dusty's sending ripples of fat on the wolf husky belly before sliding down to the floor, Now the ropes tide to Kodi's legs were also free as he could move a bit again but he couldn't move at all as he was heavy.

"Dusty, why?" said now that it looks like it has been done with him not just being fat but morbidly obese. "Because I wanted to show you my love and affection to you Kodi." Kodi was some what confused form the answer and was going to say something back until he felt like something coming out from his maw.

*BELCH* Kodi burped a rupptly which made Dusty giggle at him and Kodi looked at her just seeing how her giggles also sent ripples on her belly, just seeing that made Kodi blushed as he realized just how beautiful she looked being fat. Both of their bellies made nosises together as if singing in harmony. "So how does it feel?" Dusty said to him as she rubs her paw on Kodi belly which just felt so good. "Well uh." Kodi said as he couldn't come up with words but he was starting to get the hang of it as his big belly just felt so soft like a dog bed along with it being so warm as the blizzard was still going on outside. "You like it don't you?" Dusty said to him in his ear to which Kodi said, "You know maybe this aint so bad." "See? I know you would come around." Dusty said before a belch came from her. "Oh, sorry about that, all this eating has sort of made me sleepy." "Yeah I think so to-HIC!" Kodi said as feeling the same way.


"Love you Kodi." Dusty said as she laid her head down on Kodi's belly, "Love you too." Kodi said as he laid his on top of her head as they both fall into deep sleep in sitting positions with their big bellies side by side with their navels visible making gurgling and groaning noises together.
1422.title: Dusty knocks out Kodi

154.title: Chapter 1: Steele's Fatty Dream

155.content:
Steele was a hated outcast who'd lost all of his popularity, fans and the like after he tried to act like a survivor of the medicine sled delivery and lied about all of the other dogs having died and the medicine having been lost, with the truth thankfully being found out subsequently.

But after that, it went from bad to worse for him, for just as he tried to go for the door that had been closed on him, he saw a female winter spirit appear in front of him.

Said winter spirit, who had magical powers, said: "Steele, I am appalled by you and your actions, as well as what kind of monster that shows you are. And, though you certainly deserved to lose your glory, fans, popularity and reputation, there is one last thing you must lose, as well, before you've fully gotten your just desserts."

"What?" Steele asked. "I've just been shut the door on and everyone hates me now, not to mention that Jenna loves Balto and hates me more than ever, even though neither of them like to hate! How much worse can it get for me, anyway?"

"It's very simple." replied the winter spirit. "You see, I am magical, and, though you will not be seeing me again after this, the spell I'm about to cast will take away the final thing you've got going for you. Namely, your fit form. I am going to fatten you massively and make you unable to walk on four feet, and only your hind ones, instead, which, ironically is so, on the one hand, you'll be able to move, but on the other hand, everyone will always be able to see how fat you are."

Steele opened his eyes widely, and before he could do or say a thing, the winter spirit cast her spell and he was on his hind feet with his forelegs having become like arms and forepaws being almost like hands in a split second, with both a great many layers of fat showing on the back of his body and, far more blatantly, an enormous, super fat and jaw droppingly tremendous belly.

In fact, I am going to give you a link to a picture on Deviantart to show you how fat he was made, though it is worth pointing out that said picture was drawn not by me, but by HectorTheWolf, and, though the character with fat Steele, Metal, is a creation of HectorTheWolf's and with Steele, I want you to look only at Steele in that picture so you can know how corpulent he just became.

http://img00.deviantart.net/2aea/i/2009/...

Anyway, having seen how unbelievably obese he now was, Steele was going: "N...N...No...this can't be...it didn't just happen..."

"Oh, yes it did." said the winter spirit. "And, before I disappear, I would like to let it be known that you will now fall asleep, and when you wake up, it will be after everyone else does, and the door in front of you will fly open as my magic teleports you in front of all of the other dogs, those polar bears and that goose, though none of the humans, but the ones who you are being shown to will be together thanks to that same magic."

"P...please. Don't do this. Change me back to normal. I beg you. I've been punished enough."

"No, you haven't." stated the winter spirit. "But this is permanent, and everyone will see and know it, also thanks to my magical powers, tomorrow, so you will have been punished enough by then, by tomorrow morning. Farewell, you selfish, disgusting, rotten waste of life."

She vanished and Steele fell asleep, and everything went exactly as she made it happen even though Steele would, as she made clear herself before, never see her again.

And, when everyone was near where it turned out Steele was, as they'd find out, Steele showed up right in front of them exactly in the way the winter spirit had described, and everyone was aghast at how humongously fat he was, unable to speak for quite some time, much like Steele was.

However, the silence was eventually broken, as the ability to speak again and thus respond to this sudden and jarring sight came back to one of the dogs, who commented on what had just been shown to them immediately.

That dog was...

LOOK AT THAT ENORMOUS BELLY! AND THOSE BLUBBER LADEN SIDES AND LOVE HANDLES, TOO! BUT HEY, THERE'S MORE OF YOU TO HATE NOW! HOW DID YOU GET THAT WAY, ANYWAY? NOT THAT IT MATTERS, SINCE YOU DESERVE TO BE SO, SO, SO, SO, SO, SO FAT, BUT DO YOU WANT TO TELL US, AND NOT LIE, FOR A CHANGE? WOW, I CAN'T SPEAK ANYMORE THANKS TO HOW HARD I'M LAUGHING JUST NOW! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Everyone else burst into uproarious laughter, and Steele bellowed: "STOP LAUGHING AT ME!!!!! I HATE BEING FAT, BUT I'LL BE THIS BALL OF BLUBBER FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE! A WINTER SPIRIT APPEARED AND MADE ME THIS WAY THROUGH MAGIC! YOU MAY THINK THIS IS A LIE, BUT IT'S TRUE! IF YOU DON'T BELIEVE ME, IF IT WASN'T THAT WINTER SPIRIT THAT FATTENED ME LIKE THIS, THEN BINGO THERE CAN KNOCK ME DOWN AND LEAVE ME HELPLESS TO ANYONE AND EVERYONE WHO WANTS TO MAKE FUN OF ME AND/OR DO WHATEVER THEY WANT TO MY BELLY AND LOVE HANDLES WHILE I'M NOTHING BUT A LAUGHINGSTOCK AND A JOKE WHO'S UNABLE TO GET UP!!!!!"

Balto then said: "Well, then, since winter spirits don't exist, it's knocking down time, Steele!" and ran over to trip Steele and knock him over on his back, leaving him helpless, unable to get up and vulnerable to anyone and everyone who would do anything and everything that they chose to do to him.

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!" Steele cried, and Jenna then said: "Yes. Now, then, what do you think one or more or even all of us should do? Anyone?"

Jenna was answered by Dixie when she said that they should...
15532.title: Postively disposable and dreadfully fat

info.brief_description: An interactice story on Balto, Steele and the other dog and wolf characters in the movie.
info.description:
Balto and the others are gaining weight and are becoming a bit on the big side. You will get to write chapters for one of these five characters. Balto, Jenna, Aleu (Balto and Jenna's daughter), Kodi (Balto and Jenna's son), and Steele.

Story Rules:

The main character in the story must be the gainer.
Other in one story can gain too.
The chapters need to be decently long and not too short.
Keep it clean. Nothing digusting or sex stuff.
No Vores.
Characters and gain as much weight as you want. I'm not picky.

Other than that, have fun.
